s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Why is Amazon Stripping my Brand Name From Title Now
s: I wish I could tell you. They changed my brand name to generic because I do not have my name trademarked. Now, they just announced they changed generic to "Handmade." The problem with that is when the potential buyer clicks on the word "handmade" it takes them to the handmade category page.
